## Question 2

Given
$$
L(\lambda) = \prod_{i=1}^N \frac{1}{x_i !} \lambda^{x_i}
\exp{-\lambda} ,
$$

Find \( \lambda \) where \( L(\lambda) \) is maximized.


## Question 3

Suppose
$$
g(x) = \frac{1}{B(\alpha, \beta)} x^{\alpha - 1} (1 - x)^{\beta - 1}, \quad
x \in (0, 1)
$$
and
$$
f(x) = b(N, x) \, \theta^x (1 - \theta)^{N - x}, \quad x \in \{0, 1,
\ldots, N \} .
$$

We also know that
$$
\int_0^1 g(x) \, dx = 1 .
$$


Find \( p(x) = \int_0^1 f(x) \, g(\theta) \, d\theta \) .
